item.title: The Dutch Station Entertainment
item.desc:
Located 3 km NE of Hawarden in a quiet rural area with great views and signposted on SH7. Accommodation: B&B-room or Self- contained unit (living, 2 bedrooms)
Entertainment Options: Game circuit, Petanque and Dutch Golf (unique in New Zealand) suitable for all ages for both individuals and groups. For groups meals possible in combination with an activity.
